H0.text: Which 1979 science fiction film was at one time going to be called Star Beast. Star Trek: The Motion Picture

H1.text: Which 1979 science fiction film was at one time going to be called Star Beast. Moonraker

H2.text: Which 1979 science fiction film was at one time going to be called Star Beast. The Black Hole

H3.text: Which 1979 science fiction film was at one time going to be called Star Beast. ALIEN

A4.text: The Black Hole is a 1979 American science fiction film directed by Gary Nelson and produced by Walt Disney Productions.

A5.text: Along with Star Trek: The Motion Picture, released earlier the same month, The Black Hole was one of the last mainstream Hollywood films to have an overture at the start of the film.
